[卩]
Pictogram ( 象形 ): a kneeling person from sideview. Similar but unrelated to 欠 , in which the person kneeling has the mouth open, and 女 , in which the kneeling figure is a woman. See also 即 . Unrelated to 报 .

[節]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ʔsiːɡ ): semantic ⺮ ( “ bamboo ” ) + phonetic 即 ( OC *ʔsɯɡ ) . It represents the "node" of bamboo, and by extension, signifies a segment or boundary. [ 1 ]

[节]
simplified and variant form of 節
